metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29578 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: mp4v2 v2.0.0 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow via the mp4v2::impl::MP4StringProperty::~MP4StringProperty() function at src/mp4property.cpp.

notes.Note: alexmurray> Apparently this is a duplicate of CVE-2018-17236 - https://github.com/TechSmith/mp4v2/issues/74#issuecomment-1490921699

criterions.comment: mp4v2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
